titleInfo.title: Blue Christmas at the Ace of Clubs (red)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing it's Dave Pomeroy's Blue Christmas! featuring Dave Pomeroy and Johnny Neel at the Ace of Clubs on December 16. Poster features woodcuts of trees and bows.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
